attributes.action: lower car tax on ALL cars..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think the car tax is to high on all cars, i would love to get it lowered as we are not benifiting from our car tax money there roads where i live are disgraceful and to think i pay £125.00 a year to drive on the roads. 
please lower road tax us people on lower wages are getting fleeced every day by the government to pay our tax.
